subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Filling in for the injured Daniel Murphy at second base, the 20-year-old Dilson Herrera, who skipped Class AAA ball altogether, became the youngest player in the majors.
snippet: Filling in for the injured Daniel Murphy at second base, the 20-year-old Dilson Herrera, who skipped Class AAA ball altogether, became the youngest player in the majors.
